---
title: "Sums and Means"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
responses <- factor(sample(1:5, 500, replace = TRUE), 
                    levels = 1:5, 
                    labels = c("Disagree", "Slightly Disagree", "Neutral", "Slightly Agree", "Agree"))

# Create the dataframe
data_df <- data.frame(x_1 = responses,
                      x_2 = responses,
                      x_3 = responses,
                      x_4 = responses,
                      x_5 = responses)
```

## score by summing

```{r}
data_df <- data_df %>%
  mutate(x_sum = rowSums(across(starts_with("x_"), ~ as.numeric(.))))
```

## score by mean

```{r}
data_df <- data_df %>%
  mutate(x_mean = rowMeans(across(starts_with("x_"), ~ as.numeric(.))))
```
